snippet.title: Freelancing Promo
snippet.description:
Freelancing Course Details
• Batch Duration: 12 Weeks
• Videos Duration: 24 hours
• Start Date: 01 Aug 2019
• Fee: Free of Cost
• Who can Join: Everyone

• Video Medium: Urdu & English

About
This course is meant to teach the tips and tricks of freelancing in the simplest and effective way. The do`s and don`ts are discussed, about which a freelancer must be aware of. Introduction of different types of freelance marketplaces is given in this course. Web portals like Fiverr, Guru, and Freelancer are introduced and discussed in detail so that a trainee could effectively make money by using these portals.
Meet the Trainer

Hisham Sarwar  (Master of Business Administration (MBA))
Hisham Sarwar, a seasoned freelancer has always been known to be an independent thinker and a risk-taker, proving his vision time and again.
Infomist, his brainchild, was established at the time when not many had foreseen the demand for website development. Since then, it has grown leaps and bounds under his visionary leadership, perseverance and hard work. Starting with a single computer to now a medium sized team to provide the best possible services as an outsource company, Infomist is a success story. With branches in different cities and head office based in Dublin, Ireland, Infomist primarily caters to the international market.
Hisham`s determination, relentless energy, motivation and adaptability have proved him as a true leader. His contribution towards humanitarian causes and respect towards individuals has been exemplary.
Hisham Sarwar has also initiated a lot of projects like https://rozgarpakistan.com/, http://www.beingguru.com/, http://truedrops.com/ to name few. Hisham is a tech social entrepreneur by heart who wants to give back to the community.
What you will learn
After completing this course, a trainee will be able to:


o Define freelancing
o Identify different types of freelance marketplaces
o Identify pros and cons to freelancing
o Identify and apply their strengths/skills in freelance market.
o Sign up as a freelancer at different platforms
o Create an effective profile on freelance platforms
o Search the right projects
o Write a winning proposal
o Define the importance of communication skills
o Manage a project once it is awarded
o Manage project payments (escrow, invoicing system)
o Identify the importance of feedback for profile
o Identify the steps to keep projects coming
o Identify the mistakes and problems every freelancer faces
o Identify steps to become a Successful Freelancer
o Identify the steps for effective Bidding to get the most from the process
o Identify the steps to grow as a freelancer
o Identify how to retain existing client


#DigiSkills, #Ignite, #Virtual_University, #Ministry_of_Information_Technology, #Govt_of_Pakistan,
#Tutorial, #Course, #Urdu, #Learn, #Earn


1. Freelancing, Hisham Sarwar,
2. AutoCAD, Syed Arif Hussain,
3. Creative Writing,  Amena Aly Kamaal, Ayesha Fazlur Rehman
4. Digital Literacy, Vu Team,
5. Digital Marketing,  Dr. Yasir Rashid,
6. E-Commerce Management,  Sheraz Pervaiz,
7. Graphic Designing, Yasir Javed Dogar,
8. SEO, Search Enginge Optimization, Usman Latif,
9. QuickBooks, Syed Hassan Adnan
10. WordPress, Saad Hamid,

#QuickBooks, #Syed_Hassan_Adnan,
#Freelancing, #Hisham_Sarwar,
#E_Commerce_Management, #Sheraz_Pervaiz, 
#Digital_Marketing, #Dr_Yasir_Rashid, 
#Digital_Literacy, #VU_Team,
#AutoCAD, #Syed_Arif_Hussain,
#WordPress, #Saad_Hamid,
 #Graphic_Designing, #Yasir_Javed_Dogar, 
#Creative_Writing, #Amena_Aly_Kamaal, #Ayesha_Fazlur_Rehman,
#SEO, #Search_Engine_Optimization, #Usman_Latif,

Freelance Marketplace where above skills can use to start earning career as freelancer 
https://fiverr.com/
https://upwork.com/
https://freelancer.com/
https://guru.com/
https://peopleperhour.com/
http://firstfreelance.com/

What is the DigiSkills Program?

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:
 
Freelancing, Hisham Sarwar, 
AutoCAD, Syed Arif Hussain, 
Creative Writing, Amena Aly Kamaal, Ayesha Fazlur Rehman 
Digital Literacy, Vu Team, 
Digital Marketing, Dr. Yasir Rashid,

Introduction of different types of freelance marketplaces is given in this course. Web portals like Fiverr, Guru, and Freelancer are introduced and discussed in detail so that a trainee could effectively make money by using these portals.

Meet The Trainer

Hisham Sarwar (Master of Business Administration (MBA))
Hisham Sarwar, a seasoned freelancer has always been known to be an independent thinker and a risk-taker, proving his vision time and again.
Infomist, his brainchild, was established at the time when not many had foreseen the demand for website development. Since then, it has grown leaps and bounds under his visionary leadership, perseverance and hard work. Starting with a single computer to now a medium sized team to provide the best possible services as an outsource company, Infomist is a success story. With branches in different cities and head office based in Dublin, Ireland, Infomist primarily caters to the international market.
Hisham`s determination, relentless energy, motivation and adaptability have proved him as a true leader. His contribution towards humanitarian causes and respect towards individuals has been exemplary.
Hisham Sarwar has also initiated a lot of projects like https://rozgarpakistan.com/, http://www.beingguru.com/, http://truedrops.com/ to name few. Hisham is a tech social entrepreneur by heart who wants to give back to the community.
 
What you will learn
After completing this course, a trainee will be able to:

o Define freelancing
o Identify different types of freelance marketplaces
o Identify pros and cons to freelancing
o Identify and apply their strengths/skills in freelance market.
o Sign up as a freelancer at different platforms
o Create an effective profile on freelance platforms
o Search the right projects
o Write a winning proposal
o Define the importance of communication skills
o Manage a project once it is awarded
o Manage project payments (escrow, invoicing system)
o Identify the importance of feedback for profile
o Identify the steps to keep projects coming
o Identify the mistakes and problems every freelancer faces
o Identify steps to become a Successful Freelancer
o Identify the steps for effective Bidding to get the most from the process
o Identify the steps to grow as a freelancer
o Identify how to retain existing client
 


What is the DigiSkills Program?

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:
 
Freelancing, Hisham Sarwar, 
AutoCAD, Syed Arif Hussain, 
Creative Writing, Amena Aly Kamaal, Ayesha Fazlur Rehman 
Digital Literacy, Vu Team, 
Digital Marketing, Dr. Yasir Rashid, 
E-Commerce Management, Sheraz Pervaiz, 
Graphic Designing, Yasir Javed Dogar, 
SEO, Usman Latif, 
QuickBooks, Syed Hassan Adnan

About
This course is meant to teach the tips and tricks of freelancing in the simplest and effective way. The do`s and don`ts are discussed, about which a freelancer must be aware of. Introduction of different types of freelance marketplaces is given in this course. Web portals like Fiverr, Guru, and Freelancer are introduced and discussed in detail so that a trainee could effectively make money by using these portals.

Meet The Trainer

Hisham Sarwar (Master of Business Administration (MBA))
Hisham Sarwar, a seasoned freelancer has always been known to be an independent thinker and a risk-taker, proving his vision time and again.
Infomist, his brainchild, was established at the time when not many had foreseen the demand for website development. Since then, it has grown leaps and bounds under his visionary leadership, perseverance and hard work. Starting with a single computer to now a medium sized team to provide the best possible services as an outsource company, Infomist is a success story. With branches in different cities and head office based in Dublin, Ireland, Infomist primarily caters to the international market.
Hisham`s determination, relentless energy, motivation and adaptability have proved him as a true leader. His contribution towards humanitarian causes and respect towards individuals has been exemplary.
Hisham Sarwar has also initiated a lot of projects like https://rozgarpakistan.com/, http://www.beingguru.com/, http://truedrops.com/ to name few. Hisham is a tech social entrepreneur by heart who wants to give back to the community.
 
What you will learn
After completing this course, a trainee will be able to:

o Define freelancing
o Identify different types of freelance marketplaces
o Identify pros and cons to freelancing
o Identify and apply their strengths/skills in freelance market.
o Sign up as a freelancer at different platforms
o Create an effective profile on freelance platforms
o Search the right projects
o Write a winning proposal
o Define the importance of communication skills
o Manage a project once it is awarded
o Manage project payments (escrow, invoicing system)
o Identify the importance of feedback for profile
o Identify the steps to keep projects coming
o Identify the mistakes and problems every freelancer faces
o Identify steps to become a Successful Freelancer
o Identify the steps for effective Bidding to get the most from the process
o Identify the steps to grow as a freelancer
o Identify how to retain existing client
 


What is the DigiSkills Program?

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:

• Batch Duration: 12 Weeks
• Videos Duration: 24 hours
• Start Date: 01 Aug 2019
• Fee: Free of Cost
• Who can Join: Everyone
• Video Medium: Urdu & English
About
This course is meant to teach the tips and tricks of freelancing in the simplest and effective way. The do`s and don`ts are discussed, about which a freelancer must be aware of. Introduction of different types of freelance marketplaces is given in this course. Web portals like Fiverr, Guru, and Freelancer are introduced and discussed in detail so that a trainee could effectively make money by using these portals.

Meet The Trainer

Hisham Sarwar (Master of Business Administration (MBA))
Hisham Sarwar, a seasoned freelancer has always been known to be an independent thinker and a risk-taker, proving his vision time and again.
Infomist, his brainchild, was established at the time when not many had foreseen the demand for website development. Since then, it has grown leaps and bounds under his visionary leadership, perseverance and hard work. Starting with a single computer to now a medium sized team to provide the best possible services as an outsource company, Infomist is a success story. With branches in different cities and head office based in Dublin, Ireland, Infomist primarily caters to the international market.
Hisham`s determination, relentless energy, motivation and adaptability have proved him as a true leader. His contribution towards humanitarian causes and respect towards individuals has been exemplary.
Hisham Sarwar has also initiated a lot of projects like https://rozgarpakistan.com/, http://www.beingguru.com/, http://truedrops.com/ to name few. Hisham is a tech social entrepreneur by heart who wants to give back to the community.
 
What you will learn
After completing this course, a trainee will be able to:

o Define freelancing
o Identify different types of freelance marketplaces
o Identify pros and cons to freelancing
o Identify and apply their strengths/skills in freelance market.
o Sign up as a freelancer at different platforms
o Create an effective profile on freelance platforms
o Search the right projects
o Write a winning proposal
o Define the importance of communication skills
o Manage a project once it is awarded
o Manage project payments (escrow, invoicing system)
o Identify the importance of feedback for profile
o Identify the steps to keep projects coming
o Identify the mistakes and problems every freelancer faces
o Identify steps to become a Successful Freelancer
o Identify the steps for effective Bidding to get the most from the process
o Identify the steps to grow as a freelancer
o Identify how to retain existing client
 


What is the DigiSkills Program?

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:
 
Freelancing, Hisham Sarwar, 
AutoCAD, Syed Arif Hussain, 
Creative Writing, Amena Aly Kamaal, Ayesha Fazlur Rehman 
Digital Literacy, Vu Team, 
Digital Marketing, Dr. Yasir Rashid, 
E-Commerce Management, Sheraz Pervaiz, 
Graphic Designing, Yasir Javed Dogar, 
SEO, Usman Latif, 
QuickBooks, Syed Hassan Adnan 
WordPress, Saad Hamid,

https://fiverr.com/,
https://upwork.com/,
https://freelancer.com/,
https://guru.com/,
https://peopleperhour.com/,
http://firstfreelance.com/,

About
This course is meant to teach the tips and tricks of freelancing in the simplest and effective way. The do`s and don`ts are discussed, about which a freelancer must be aware of. Introduction of different types of freelance marketplaces is given in this course. Web portals like Fiverr, Guru, and Freelancer are introduced and discussed in detail so that a trainee could effectively make money by using these portals.

Meet The Trainer

Hisham Sarwar (Master of Business Administration (MBA))
Hisham Sarwar, a seasoned freelancer has always been known to be an independent thinker and a risk-taker, proving his vision time and again.
Infomist, his brainchild, was established at the time when not many had foreseen the demand for website development. Since then, it has grown leaps and bounds under his visionary leadership, perseverance and hard work. Starting with a single computer to now a medium sized team to provide the best possible services as an outsource company, Infomist is a success story. With branches in different cities and head office based in Dublin, Ireland, Infomist primarily caters to the international market.
Hisham`s determination, relentless energy, motivation and adaptability have proved him as a true leader. His contribution towards humanitarian causes and respect towards individuals has been exemplary.
Hisham Sarwar has also initiated a lot of projects like https://rozgarpakistan.com/, http://www.beingguru.com/, http://truedrops.com/ to name few. Hisham is a tech social entrepreneur by heart who wants to give back to the community.
 
What you will learn
After completing this course, a trainee will be able to:

o Define freelancing
o Identify different types of freelance marketplaces
o Identify pros and cons to freelancing
o Identify and apply their strengths/skills in freelance market.
o Sign up as a freelancer at different platforms
o Create an effective profile on freelance platforms
o Search the right projects
o Write a winning proposal
o Define the importance of communication skills
o Manage a project once it is awarded
o Manage project payments (escrow, invoicing system)
o Identify the importance of feedback for profile
o Identify the steps to keep projects coming
o Identify the mistakes and problems every freelancer faces
o Identify steps to become a Successful Freelancer
o Identify the steps for effective Bidding to get the most from the process
o Identify the steps to grow as a freelancer
o Identify how to retain existing client

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.

By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:

#DigiSkills, #Ignite, #Virtual_University, #Ministry_of_Information_Technology, #Govt_of_Pakistan, #Tutorial, #Course, #Urdu, #Hindi, #Learn, #Earn, #Complete_Course, #How_To,

• Batch Duration: 12 Weeks
• Videos Duration: 24 hours
• Start Date: 01 Aug 2019
• Fee: Free of Cost
• Who can Join: Everyone
• Video Medium: Urdu & English
About
This course is meant to teach the tips and tricks of freelancing in the simplest and effective way. The do`s and don`ts are discussed, about which a freelancer must be aware of. Introduction of different types of freelance marketplaces is given in this course. Web portals like Fiverr, Guru, and Freelancer are introduced and discussed in detail so that a trainee could effectively make money by using these portals.

Meet The Trainer

Hisham Sarwar (Master of Business Administration (MBA))
Hisham Sarwar, a seasoned freelancer has always been known to be an independent thinker and a risk-taker, proving his vision time and again.
Infomist, his brainchild, was established at the time when not many had foreseen the demand for website development. Since then, it has grown leaps and bounds under his visionary leadership, perseverance and hard work. Starting with a single computer to now a medium sized team to provide the best possible services as an outsource company, Infomist is a success story. With branches in different cities and head office based in Dublin, Ireland, Infomist primarily caters to the international market.
Hisham`s determination, relentless energy, motivation and adaptability have proved him as a true leader. His contribution towards humanitarian causes and respect towards individuals has been exemplary.
Hisham Sarwar has also initiated a lot of projects like https://rozgarpakistan.com/, http://www.beingguru.com/, http://truedrops.com/ to name few. Hisham is a tech social entrepreneur by heart who wants to give back to the community.
 
What you will learn
After completing this course, a trainee will be able to:

o Define freelancing
o Identify different types of freelance marketplaces
o Identify pros and cons to freelancing
o Identify and apply their strengths/skills in freelance market.
o Sign up as a freelancer at different platforms
o Create an effective profile on freelance platforms
o Search the right projects
o Write a winning proposal
o Define the importance of communication skills
o Manage a project once it is awarded
o Manage project payments (escrow, invoicing system)
o Identify the importance of feedback for profile
o Identify the steps to keep projects coming
o Identify the mistakes and problems every freelancer faces
o Identify steps to become a Successful Freelancer
o Identify the steps for effective Bidding to get the most from the process
o Identify the steps to grow as a freelancer
o Identify how to retain existing client
 


What is the DigiSkills Program?

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:
 
Freelancing, Hisham Sarwar, 
AutoCAD, Syed Arif Hussain, 
Creative Writing, Amena Aly Kamaal, Ayesha Fazlur Rehman 
Digital Literacy, Vu Team, 
Digital Marketing, Dr. Yasir Rashid, 
E-Commerce Management, Sheraz Pervaiz, 
Graphic Designing, Yasir Javed Dogar, 
SEO, Usman Latif, 
QuickBooks, Syed Hassan Adnan 
WordPress, Saad Hamid,

https://fiverr.com/,
https://upwork.com/,
https://freelancer.com/,
https://guru.com/,
https://peopleperhour.com/,
http://firstfreelance.com/,

• Batch Duration: 12 Weeks
• Videos Duration: 24 hours
• Start Date: 01 Aug 2019
• Fee: Free of Cost
• Who can Join: Everyone
• Video Medium: Urdu & English
About
This course is meant to teach the tips and tricks of freelancing in the simplest and effective way. The do`s and don`ts are discussed, about which a freelancer must be aware of. Introduction of different types of freelance marketplaces is given in this course. Web portals like Fiverr, Guru, and Freelancer are introduced and discussed in detail so that a trainee could effectively make money by using these portals.

Meet The Trainer

Hisham Sarwar (Master of Business Administration (MBA))
Hisham Sarwar, a seasoned freelancer has always been known to be an independent thinker and a risk-taker, proving his vision time and again.
Infomist, his brainchild, was established at the time when not many had foreseen the demand for website development. Since then, it has grown leaps and bounds under his visionary leadership, perseverance and hard work. Starting with a single computer to now a medium sized team to provide the best possible services as an outsource company, Infomist is a success story. With branches in different cities and head office based in Dublin, Ireland, Infomist primarily caters to the international market.
Hisham`s determination, relentless energy, motivation and adaptability have proved him as a true leader. His contribution towards humanitarian causes and respect towards individuals has been exemplary.
Hisham Sarwar has also initiated a lot of projects like https://rozgarpakistan.com/, http://www.beingguru.com/, http://truedrops.com/ to name few. Hisham is a tech social entrepreneur by heart who wants to give back to the community.
 
What you will learn
After completing this course, a trainee will be able to:

o Define freelancing
o Identify different types of freelance marketplaces
o Identify pros and cons to freelancing
o Identify and apply their strengths/skills in freelance market.
o Sign up as a freelancer at different platforms
o Create an effective profile on freelance platforms
o Search the right projects
o Write a winning proposal
o Define the importance of communication skills
o Manage a project once it is awarded
o Manage project payments (escrow, invoicing system)
o Identify the importance of feedback for profile
o Identify the steps to keep projects coming
o Identify the mistakes and problems every freelancer faces
o Identify steps to become a Successful Freelancer
o Identify the steps for effective Bidding to get the most from the process
o Identify the steps to grow as a freelancer
o Identify how to retain existing client
 


What is the DigiSkills Program?

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:
 
Freelancing, Hisham Sarwar, 
AutoCAD, Syed Arif Hussain, 
Creative Writing, Amena Aly Kamaal, Ayesha Fazlur Rehman 
Digital Literacy, Vu Team, 
Digital Marketing, Dr. Yasir Rashid, 
E-Commerce Management, Sheraz Pervaiz, 
Graphic Designing, Yasir Javed Dogar, 
SEO, Usman Latif, 
QuickBooks, Syed Hassan Adnan 
WordPress, Saad Hamid,

https://fiverr.com/,
https://upwork.com/,
https://freelancer.com/,
https://guru.com/,
https://peopleperhour.com/,
http://firstfreelance.com/,

#DigiSkills, #Ignite, #Virtual_University, #Ministry_of_Information_Technology, #Govt_of_Pakistan, #Tutorial, #Course, #Urdu, #Hindi, #Learn, #Earn, #Complete_Course, #How_To,

• Batch Duration: 12 Weeks
• Videos Duration: 24 hours
• Start Date: 01 Aug 2019
• Fee: Free of Cost
• Who can Join: Everyone
• Video Medium: Urdu & English
About
This course is meant to teach the tips and tricks of freelancing in the simplest and effective way. The do`s and don`ts are discussed, about which a freelancer must be aware of. Introduction of different types of freelance marketplaces is given in this course. Web portals like Fiverr, Guru, and Freelancer are introduced and discussed in detail so that a trainee could effectively make money by using these portals.

Meet The Trainer

Hisham Sarwar (Master of Business Administration (MBA))
Hisham Sarwar, a seasoned freelancer has always been known to be an independent thinker and a risk-taker, proving his vision time and again.
Infomist, his brainchild, was established at the time when not many had foreseen the demand for website development. Since then, it has grown leaps and bounds under his visionary leadership, perseverance and hard work. Starting with a single computer to now a medium sized team to provide the best possible services as an outsource company, Infomist is a success story. With branches in different cities and head office based in Dublin, Ireland, Infomist primarily caters to the international market.
Hisham`s determination, relentless energy, motivation and adaptability have proved him as a true leader. His contribution towards humanitarian causes and respect towards individuals has been exemplary.
Hisham Sarwar has also initiated a lot of projects like https://rozgarpakistan.com/, http://www.beingguru.com/, http://truedrops.com/ to name few. Hisham is a tech social entrepreneur by heart who wants to give back to the community.
 
What you will learn
After completing this course, a trainee will be able to:

o Define freelancing
o Identify different types of freelance marketplaces
o Identify pros and cons to freelancing
o Identify and apply their strengths/skills in freelance market.
o Sign up as a freelancer at different platforms
o Create an effective profile on freelance platforms
o Search the right projects
o Write a winning proposal
o Define the importance of communication skills
o Manage a project once it is awarded
o Manage project payments (escrow, invoicing system)
o Identify the importance of feedback for profile
o Identify the steps to keep projects coming
o Identify the mistakes and problems every freelancer faces
o Identify steps to become a Successful Freelancer
o Identify the steps for effective Bidding to get the most from the process
o Identify the steps to grow as a freelancer
o Identify how to retain existing client
 


What is the DigiSkills Program?

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:
 
Freelancing, Hisham Sarwar, 
AutoCAD, Syed Arif Hussain, 
Creative Writing, Amena Aly Kamaal, Ayesha Fazlur Rehman 
Digital Literacy, Vu Team, 
Digital Marketing, Dr. Yasir Rashid, 
E-Commerce Management, Sheraz Pervaiz, 
Graphic Designing, Yasir Javed Dogar, 
SEO, Usman Latif, 
QuickBooks, Syed Hassan Adnan 
WordPress, Saad Hamid,

Introduction of different types of freelance marketplaces is given in this course. Web portals like Fiverr, Guru, and Freelancer are introduced and discussed in detail so that a trainee could effectively make money by using these portals.

Meet The Trainer

Hisham Sarwar (Master of Business Administration (MBA))
Hisham Sarwar, a seasoned freelancer has always been known to be an independent thinker and a risk-taker, proving his vision time and again.
Infomist, his brainchild, was established at the time when not many had foreseen the demand for website development. Since then, it has grown leaps and bounds under his visionary leadership, perseverance and hard work. Starting with a single computer to now a medium sized team to provide the best possible services as an outsource company, Infomist is a success story. With branches in different cities and head office based in Dublin, Ireland, Infomist primarily caters to the international market.
Hisham`s determination, relentless energy, motivation and adaptability have proved him as a true leader. His contribution towards humanitarian causes and respect towards individuals has been exemplary.
Hisham Sarwar has also initiated a lot of projects like https://rozgarpakistan.com/, http://www.beingguru.com/, http://truedrops.com/ to name few. Hisham is a tech social entrepreneur by heart who wants to give back to the community.
 
What you will learn
After completing this course, a trainee will be able to:

o Define freelancing
o Identify different types of freelance marketplaces
o Identify pros and cons to freelancing
o Identify and apply their strengths/skills in freelance market.
o Sign up as a freelancer at different platforms
o Create an effective profile on freelance platforms
o Search the right projects
o Write a winning proposal
o Define the importance of communication skills
o Manage a project once it is awarded
o Manage project payments (escrow, invoicing system)
o Identify the importance of feedback for profile
o Identify the steps to keep projects coming
o Identify the mistakes and problems every freelancer faces
o Identify steps to become a Successful Freelancer
o Identify the steps for effective Bidding to get the most from the process
o Identify the steps to grow as a freelancer
o Identify how to retain existing client
 


What is the DigiSkills Program?

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:
 
Freelancing, Hisham Sarwar, 
AutoCAD, Syed Arif Hussain, 
Creative Writing, Amena Aly Kamaal, Ayesha Fazlur Rehman 
Digital Literacy, Vu Team, 
Digital Marketing, Dr. Yasir Rashid, 
E-Commerce Management, Sheraz Pervaiz, 
Graphic Designing, Yasir Javed Dogar, 
SEO, Usman Latif, 
QuickBooks, Syed Hassan Adnan 
WordPress, Saad Hamid,

https://fiverr.com/,
https://upwork.com/,
https://freelancer.com/,
https://guru.com/,
https://peopleperhour.com/,

snippet.title: Freelancing 201 Your role in taking up Pakistan’s ranking Tutor Hisham Sarwar in Urdu,Hindi
snippet.description:
Freelancing

#DigiSkills, #Ignite, #Virtual_University, #Ministry_of_Information_Technology, #Govt_of_Pakistan, #Tutorial, #Course, #Urdu, #Hindi, #Learn, #Earn, #Complete_Course, #How_To,

• Batch Duration: 12 Weeks
• Videos Duration: 24 hours
• Start Date: 01 Aug 2019
• Fee: Free of Cost
• Who can Join: Everyone
• Video Medium: Urdu & English
About
This course is meant to teach the tips and tricks of freelancing in the simplest and effective way. The do`s and don`ts are discussed, about which a freelancer must be aware of. Introduction of different types of freelance marketplaces is given in this course. Web portals like Fiverr, Guru, and Freelancer are introduced and discussed in detail so that a trainee could effectively make money by using these portals.

Meet The Trainer

Hisham Sarwar (Master of Business Administration (MBA))
Hisham Sarwar, a seasoned freelancer has always been known to be an independent thinker and a risk-taker, proving his vision time and again.
Infomist, his brainchild, was established at the time when not many had foreseen the demand for website development. Since then, it has grown leaps and bounds under his visionary leadership, perseverance and hard work. Starting with a single computer to now a medium sized team to provide the best possible services as an outsource company, Infomist is a success story. With branches in different cities and head office based in Dublin, Ireland, Infomist primarily caters to the international market.
Hisham`s determination, relentless energy, motivation and adaptability have proved him as a true leader. His contribution towards humanitarian causes and respect towards individuals has been exemplary.
Hisham Sarwar has also initiated a lot of projects like https://rozgarpakistan.com/, http://www.beingguru.com/, http://truedrops.com/ to name few. Hisham is a tech social entrepreneur by heart who wants to give back to the community.
 
What you will learn
After completing this course, a trainee will be able to:

o Define freelancing
o Identify different types of freelance marketplaces
o Identify pros and cons to freelancing
o Identify and apply their strengths/skills in freelance market.
o Sign up as a freelancer at different platforms
o Create an effective profile on freelance platforms
o Search the right projects
o Write a winning proposal
o Define the importance of communication skills
o Manage a project once it is awarded
o Manage project payments (escrow, invoicing system)
o Identify the importance of feedback for profile
o Identify the steps to keep projects coming
o Identify the mistakes and problems every freelancer faces
o Identify steps to become a Successful Freelancer
o Identify the steps for effective Bidding to get the most from the process
o Identify the steps to grow as a freelancer
o Identify how to retain existing client
 


What is the DigiSkills Program?

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:
 
Freelancing, Hisham Sarwar, 
AutoCAD, Syed Arif Hussain, 
Creative Writing, Amena Aly Kamaal, Ayesha Fazlur Rehman 
Digital Literacy, Vu Team, 
Digital Marketing, Dr. Yasir Rashid, 
E-Commerce Management, Sheraz Pervaiz, 
Graphic Designing, Yasir Javed Dogar, 
SEO, Usman Latif, 
QuickBooks, Syed Hassan Adnan 
WordPress, Saad Hamid,

https://freelancer.com/,
https://guru.com/,
